summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.41.004, 23.41.014, 23.71.020, 23.71.028, 23.71.029, 23.76.029, 23.76.004, and 23.76.026 to revise the requirements for General Development Plans in the Northgate Overlay District, and for Design Review and adding a new Section 23.71.031 relating to the duration of a General Development Plan, and 23.71.032 relating to the sale or transfer of property subject to a General Development Plan.
